page.title: 02RECREATION
page.content: Brownies are held there, also play-group, jumble sales, and parish council meetings are held regularly, and there is s spinning group. Nestlig at the fot of the hills, but still 400ft above sea level - Hilton is a village with no pub or shop, however, we have a church, a bus station and all amenities are provided by mobile facilities. There is no mains gas or sewerage. Milton Abby's rebuilding was started (after a fire in the 14th Cent) in 1331 and was not finished when the dissolution came in 1539. It was restored in 1789 and at this moment scaffolding is up around the tower for more restoration to be carried out.
